name: AFK Idol: Path to Fame
description:
Help Panti - A budding Idol - to become the Music Legend of her dreams!

Start off in her small farm town and help her collect enough money and fans to make her way out into the world and capture the hearts of music lovers all over the world!

Once you do this, she can perform in a concert for her devoted fans and earn enough money and fame to move to bigger and better towns and cities.

— Improve Your Skills —
Help Panti to train and improve various skills such as Singing Talent and Marketability so that she can reach superstardom.
You can also choose her Genre Specialisation (Rock, Pop, Reggae) to suit your playstyle.

— Improve Your Looks —
Unlock various clothing items to suit your style and to make Panti as cute as can be.
Make sure to share updates to her outfit with your friends!
